items.sentence: Tom told Mary that he used to live in Boston.
Tom and Mary are going downtown to eat pizza.
Tom thought Mary already knew how to do that.
Tom thought Mary seemed to be gaining weight.
I can\'t believe Tom did all this by himself.
I can\'t believe that Tom is older than Mary.
Tom doesn\'t have any friends here in Boston.
Tom doesn\'t have as many books as Mary does.
Tom doesn\'t have enough credits to graduate.
Tom doesn\'t have time right now to help you.
Tom doesn\'t have to tell me. I already know.
Tom poured another glass of wine for himself.
Tom pressed the button, but nothing happened.
I thought I\'d try eating Mexican food today.
I thought Tom wasn\'t going to be here today.
Tom has trouble expressing his true feelings.
Tom intends to stay in Boston for three days.
I was told that Tom doesn\'t need to do that.
Tom ate what many people call a healthy diet.
Tom avoided making any comment on the matter.
